disp-quote.p: “[NGO] is doing médecine de troupeau [herd medicine]. When a sheep is sick, well, you have to treat all the sheep in the same way. It’s not individualized medicine on a case-by-case basis, no.” (doctor, ID#18)
“[NGO] has a protocole figé [rigid frozen protocol]. EVD patient equals protocol…” (doctor, ID#18)
“For [NGO], the objective is to limit the epidemic, isolate the sick. Even if he dies, no problem, so long as he doesn’t contaminate others.” (doctor, ID#17)
